home-page.title: Next.js Auth Demo
home-page.subtitle: A full-featured authentication demo using Next.js frontend and Node.js backend, combining sessions with JWT for secure and scalable login flows.
home-page.description: This demo app is a real-world example of implementing secure authentication using Next.js on the frontend and a Node.js backend. It combines JWT and sessions to balance stateless APIs with server-side control ‚Äî great for full-stack developers building production-ready login flows.
